programme.title: Greta Garbo and Jim Henson
programme.short_synopsis: The lives and careers of Greta Garbo (1905-1990) and Jim Henson (1936-1990)
programme.medium_synopsis: The death of Greta Garbo, the way in which television is prolonging the life of movies, and a eulogy for puppeteer Jim Henson, as discussed by Alistair Cooke.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
